title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows Has Been Delayed AGAIN - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.09.25
description:
Go to http://rocketmoney.com/kindafunny to cancel your unwanted subscriptions with Rocket Money.

Assassin’s Creed Shadows Has Been Delayed AGAIN, a new Xbox Developer_Direct is happening, and a lot of productions you’re looking forward to have been halted due to the LA fires.

Thanks to the overwhelming generosity from the community, we have a new batch of gifted Patreon memberships going up on Saturday at 9am PT on Kinda Funny Patreon page! To be able to see the post, create a Patreon account and click the "Join for Free" button on patreon.com/kindafunny! If you have gifted memberships left over from the stream, you can send them to support@kindafunny.com to be included in Saturday's post!
We’re an 11-person business all about live talk shows.
Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
GAMESCAST - is Blessing and Snowbike Mike reacting to Rolling Stone’s Top 50 games of all time
The STREAM is more Marvel Rivals with Stella
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
You can get today’s Gregway
And you can get What If? Season 3 in Review this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Delaney Twining & Karl Jacobs

KFGD010925
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:20 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:08:20 - Assassin's Creed Shadows Delayed Again, This Time by Another Month - Wesley Yin-Poole @ IGN
00:22:03 - Xbox Developer_Direct Returns on January 23 - Xbox Wire
00:40:00 - Ad  
00:41:38 - Fallout Season 2 Filming Halted Due to LA Fires - Matt Kim @ IGN
00:46:10 - Shadow of the Colossus movie ‘not abandoned by any means’ - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:51:10 - Wee News!
00:52:52 - SuperChats
